name: Tyron BLANDING, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Respondents

parties: Tyron BLANDING, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Respondents

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 16th day of September, 2016, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
157 A.3d 489
Tyron BLANDING, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Respondents
No. 121 EM 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
September 16, 2016
